div.p: Crestview Schools are committed to keeping our community up-to-date while we work to adapt to the developing response to COVID-19. This resource will continue to be updated as a reference resource for our students and families.

div.br:
Academic student recognition programs will be developed in all buildings that demonstrate student academic success throughout each school year. Successes will be shared through district communication and building displays.
DATA COLLECTION
District decisions will be driven by pertinent and relevant research.
COMMUNICATIONS
Multiple communication strategies will be utilized providing all stakeholders in the district opportunities for increased information-sharing.
INSTRUCTION
All students will receive rigorous and relevant instruction specifically designed for their various levels of academic abilities.
FINANCIAL
The District will remain fiscally responsible and transparent as we promote and support District goals.
